Provo.George and Temperance Adams House:
The George and Temperance Adams House is a historic house located at 196 West 400 South in Orem, Utah.


== Description and history ==
Built in 1895 and expanded in 1903, the Late Victorian-style house is architecturally significant as an example of economic prosperity enabling better building methods. The house is built with brick upon adobe and has more detail than previous common types of homes.
